response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and worth, far exceeding its monetary value. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exceptional chance to own something truly remarkable. I look forward to discussing this further with you and potentially welcoming you as the proud owner of this masterpiece.", "product_price": 750000}
